author: 小浪财讯
title: 医疗ETF南方（159877）跌0.90%，半日成交额40.54万元|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，医疗ETF南方（159877）跌0.90%，报0.548元，成交额40.54万元。医疗ETF南方（159877）重仓股方面， 迈瑞医疗 截止午盘跌1.30%， 爱尔眼科 跌1.16%， 联影医疗 涨0.26%， 爱美客 跌1.08%， 新产业 跌0.36%， 惠泰医疗 跌0.54%， 鱼跃医疗 涨0.54%， 美年健康 跌1.59%， 九安医疗 跌0.53%， 山东药玻 跌0.40%。
医疗ETF南方（159877）业绩比较基准为中证全指医疗保健设备与服务指数收益率，管理人为南方基金管理股份有限公司，基金经理为朱恒红，成立（2021-10-22）以来回报为-44.59%，近一个月回报为-0.70%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: @record_mexico
title: Eclipse Total de Luna 2025: Así puedes ver la 'luna de sangre' este 13 y 14 de marzo
text:
El próximo 13 de marzo es una fecha importante para todos aquellos admiradores de la luna, ya se podrá ver un eclipse total lunar, donde nuestro satélite natural se pondrá en color rojo.
A este fenómeno se le conoce como la ‘luna de sangre’ por la gran tonalidad que alcanza y que puede ser apreciado desde la Tierra. Cabe recordar que este eclipse lunar será el único en todo 2025.
¿Por qué se llama ‘luna de sangre’?
La ‘luna de sangre’ se produce cuando la Tierra se interpone entre el sol y la luna, lo que hace que se proyecte una sombra en la superficie lunar.
Durante el tiempo que dura este fenómeno natural va adquiriendo un color rojizo hecho por la refracción de luz solar a través de la atmósfera, o como mejor se le conoce: dispersión de Rayleigh.
El evento podrá ser apreciado en todo México durante seis horas, comenzando a las 23:09 horas del 13 de marzo y terminando el 14 de marzo a las 02:47 horas. Su punto máximo sería a las 00:59.
¿Qué se necesita para poder ver el eclipse lunar?
Que el cielo esté despejado.
Alejarnos de la contaminación lumínica.
No se necesitan filtros o telescopios, se puede ver a simple vista
Mejora la vista si se cuenta con binoculares o telescopios.
Pueden seguir páginas como la NASA y de aficionados a la astronomía
Descargar aplicaciones de uso libre como Stelarium, Starwall y Skytonight para más precisión en sus búsquedas por eclipses y estrellas.
TAMBIÉN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: ¿QUIERES CAMBIARTE EL APELLIDO? ASÍ PUEDES HACERLO EN MÉXICO: REQUISITOS Y COSTOS

author: 唐 有為
title: 上山施肥誤觸搬運車開關 苗栗果農遭撞夾擊慘死
text:
上山施肥誤觸搬運車開關 苗栗果農遭撞夾擊慘死 唐 有為 2025年7月16日 週三 下午9:31
24825017a01 CNEWS匯流新聞網記者唐有為／台北報導
苗栗縣一名73歲林姓男子，昨（16）日下午前往三灣鄉大河村山區果園施肥時，不慎遭一輛農用搬運車暴衝撞擊，林男被夾困於柑橘樹與車體間，警方獲報後與消防人員趕抵現場時，林男已無生命跡象，但仍鋸斷樹幹將他送醫搶救，但最後仍宣告不治。
248250717a02 警方初步研判，林男當時疑似在搬運肥料，不慎觸碰未熄火的搬運車開關，導致車輛瞬間啟動暴衝，將他撞擊後，造成他被夾困於車車輛與果樹間，而事故發生後，搬運車引擎仍在轉動、輪胎呈現空轉狀態。
警方表示，由於事發當時林男是獨自作業，直到傍晚，有農友前往果園準備向他借電線時，才意外發現他受困，目前已報由苗栗地檢署進行相驗，以進一步釐清死因與事發過程。
照片來源：苗栗縣警方提供

author: Ryan Kh
title: Maximizing Home Efficiency: The Renewable Way
text: Homeowners increasingly opt for renewable energy sources for a sustainable, cost-effective lifestyle. This trend supports environmental care and offers a way to lower utility bills over time, appealing to those looking to enhance their homes and contribute to the planet’s well-being. Among the various renewable options, each with its benefits, solar energy stands out for its accessibility and recent technological improvements. Solar energy fits well in residential areas, offering a dependable, clean power source. The benefits of solar energy include significant electricity cost savings and a positive environmental impact, making it a top choice for anyone considering greener energy solutions. Continue reading to discover how renewable energy can make your home a paragon of efficiency and sustainability. Understanding Renewable Energy Options Exploring the variety of renewable energy options is the first step toward making your home more efficient and sustainable. Understanding what’s available allows you to make informed decisions aligning with your environmental and financial goals. Below are the key renewable energy sources to consider for your home: - Solar panels: These devices convert sunlight directly into electricity. They’re versatile, can be installed on rooftops or in open areas, and are effective even on cloudy days to some extent. The long-term savings on electricity bills offset the initial setup cost. - Wind turbines: Suitable for properties with enough space and located in windy areas. Small residential turbines can supplement your energy needs, reducing reliance on the grid. They work best in open areas free of obstructions that could block wind flow. - Geothermal heating and cooling: This system uses the earth’s stable underground temperature to heat and cool your home more efficiently than traditional HVAC systems. It involves installing underground pipes that exchange heat with the ground, which remains at a constant temperature year-round. - Hydropower systems: A small hydroelectric system could be viable if you can access a flowing water source on your property. It generates electricity by channeling flowing water through a turbine. Though not applicable for everyone, it’s highly efficient where feasible. Every renewable energy choice has its advantages. Whether you aim to lower your carbon footprint, save on energy bills, or boost your property’s value, there’s a renewable energy solution. Consider your location, budget, and energy needs to pick the most suitable renewable energy for your home. The Brilliance Of Solar Energy For Homeowners Solar energy shines brightly as a leading choice among renewable resources for home efficiency. Its benefits extend beyond simple utility savings, offering significant environmental and property value advantages. Here are the key benefits that make solar power a bright idea: - Cost savings: Installing solar panels can dramatically lower your monthly electricity bills. By generating your own power, you depend less on the utility grid, saving money over the lifespan of your solar system. The initial investment in solar technology pays off as you enjoy reduced utility costs year after year. - Environmental impact: Solar panels have a direct positive effect on the environment by reducing your carbon footprint. Unlike fossil fuels, solar power generates clean, renewable energy from the sun, significantly decreasing greenhouse gas emissions. This shift to a more sustainable energy source reflects a commitment to protecting the planet for future generations. - Increased home value: Homes equipped with solar energy systems often experience a surge in market value. Prospective buyers are willing to pay more for a home with solar installations, recognizing the benefits of lower energy costs and environmental impact. This increase in home value makes solar power an energy-saving measure and a wise investment in your property. Choosing solar power is a wise step towards a sustainable and cost-effective future. Among renewable energy options, solar energy is notable for its simplicity, efficiency, and positive effects on finances and the environment. Tapping Into Geothermal Energy For Efficient Heating And Cooling Geothermal heating and cooling systems represent an innovative solution for homeowners seeking to enhance their property’s efficiency and comfort. By tapping into the earth’s constant underground temperature, these systems offer a reliable and sustainable alternative to traditional HVAC methods. Below are the advantages of geothermal systems: - Efficiency: Geothermal technology excels in its minimal electricity use compared to conventional systems. This high-efficiency level is complemented when geothermal solutions are used with energy-efficient air conditioners, allowing for even greater energy savings and environmental benefits. - Durability: One of the most compelling aspects of geothermal systems is their longevity. The underground components are shielded from the elements, contributing to a lifespan that often surpasses 20 years. This durability makes geothermal a long-term investment in your home’s comfort and efficiency. - Comfort: Geothermal heating and cooling systems provide unparalleled indoor temperature stability. Unlike traditional systems, which may produce temperature fluctuations, geothermal units maintain a consistent indoor environment year-round. This steady temperature control contributes to an overall more comfortable living space. Geothermal technology can lessen environmental impact and boost home efficiency and comfort. Investing in geothermal means choosing reliable, affordable temperature control for the future, a wise decision to protect against increasing energy costs and climate change. Conclusion Renewable energy, like solar power and geothermal systems, makes homes more sustainable and efficient. These options help homeowners save money, increase comfort, and lessen their environmental impact. Moving towards a greener lifestyle requires making smart decisions and embracing new technologies, balancing modern living and caring for the environment. Choosing renewable energy shows a strong commitment to the planet’s health and well-being. author: Daily Excelsior
title: Amnesty scheme big relief to dealers: CCI
text:
‘100 % hike at Nashri Toll Plaza most unfair ‘
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Dec 28: The Jammu Chamber of Industries and Commerce president, Arun Gupta has said that a big relief has been accorded to the dealers with the amnesty scheme.
The Chamber president expressed his deep gratitude to the Manoj Sinha, LG UT of J&K, Rajeev Rai Bhatnagar, Advisor to LG, Atal Dulloo, Chief Secretary UT of J&K for accepting our long pending demand regarding granting amnesty for settlement of tax arrears pertaining to Pre GST regime for the dealers who could not take the benefit of earlier amnesty scheme issued vide order no. 39-F-D of 2018 due to various reasons especially Covid-19 pandemic.
Gupta said that this amnesty scheme will provide relief to the dealers on 100% waiver of penalty and interest under general sales tax act 1962, Central Sales Tax 1956 and VAT Act 2005. He further said that this decision of the Government will result in minimizing the tax dispute cases.
Arun Gupta requests the business community to avail tax benefit of this amnesty scheme by depositing the tax arrears within the prescribed time limit.
He further said that during the initial stage of implementing the GST scheme there were some technical / other minor mistakes on the part of the dealers/ assesses due to unawareness about GST scheme. Chamber requests the government that those dealers / assesses should be given one time opportunity to settle their cases especially for the period 2017-2018, 2018-2019 and 2019-2020.
Gupta also requests the Government/NHAI to reconsider the decision of enhancing the toll tax by 100% at Nashri Toll Plaza as it will effect the business community/general public badly.
Amnesty scheme big relief to dealers: CCI
‘100 % hike at Nashri Toll Plaza most unfair ‘

author: Jewel Stolarchuk
title: Conserving mangroves and peatlands could help massively cut down on carbon emissions: Study
text:
SINGAPORE: Southeast Asia’s carbon-rich peatlands and mangroves have emerged as key ecosystems in the fight against climate change, according to a recent study published in Nature Communications. The research, which involved scientists from Singapore’s National University of Singapore (NUS), NTU Singapore, and James Cook University in Australia, reveals that conserving and restoring these ecosystems could reduce more than 50 per cent of the region’s land-use carbon emissions.
Although they cover only 5 per cent of the land area in the region, peatlands and mangroves play a disproportionate role in carbon storage and emission reduction. These ecosystems are among the most efficient natural carbon sinks, with over 90 per cent of their carbon stored in soils rather than vegetation.
However, when these vital ecosystems are disturbed or destroyed through activities like land conversion for agriculture or development, they release significant amounts of carbon back into the atmosphere, exacerbating the climate crisis. This highlights the importance of protecting and restoring these habitats as part of broader efforts to meet climate targets set by ASEAN countries.
The study highlights the potential of wetland conservation to contribute to both environmental sustainability and economic development. Assistant Professor Pierre Taillardat of NTU Singapore, a co-author of the paper and principal investigator at the Wetland Carbon Lab at the Asian School of the Environment, emphasized that wetland soils may have limited agricultural value but are unparalleled in their ability to store carbon.
“If carbon were valued like other essential commodities, such as being traded on the carbon credits market, it could unlock vast opportunities for conservation and restoration projects,” Asst Prof Taillardat said. He also noted that such initiatives could create win-win scenarios where local communities benefit from sustainable ecosystems while contributing to global emission reduction efforts.
The researchers urge ASEAN governments to incorporate the conservation of peatlands and mangroves into their national climate action strategies. With their immense carbon storage capabilities, these ecosystems represent a cost-effective and impactful way to help Southeast Asian nations achieve their net-zero emissions goals.
The study also highlights the broader benefits of wetland conservation, including increased climate resilience and the support it offers to local communities who rely on wetlands for their livelihoods. By prioritizing the protection and restoration of these critical habitats, Southeast Asia could make significant strides toward both mitigating climate change and promoting sustainable development across the region.
